vote.title: Authorize a twenty-year interlocal agreement between the City of Dallas and the Richardson Independent School District for shared access of campus grounds and the design, construction and maintenance of park improvements at Dobie Pre-Kindergarten School located at 14040 Rolling Hills Lane - Not to exceed $285,200.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
